top_comments.comment: Because the pandemic has made people realise that there is more to life than work and you do not need to live in a consumer society.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Because the pandemic has made people realise that there is more to life than work and you do not need to live in a consumer society.
Flexibility?  Until it comes to the vaccine, in which case screw your flexibility and freedom!  Let’s go Brandon!
Yes.. quit and live off the government. Great idea.

This is all "crap".
If I quit my job, people would die.
Find a job that is rewarding and challenging. 
And contributes to society.
This is all about Covid, which is leading to the great awakening. People are standing up for their rights because all the corruption from world leaders and big companies are all coming to the surface
I feel that good % of those have made this decision will regret for their decision. The gaps will be filled by entry levels.

Your have an interesting idea about how companies have to bow to the wants and desires of employees. However, I'm thinking you may be overlooking what is coming in the next ten years.   According to the tech. Experts, new technologies are going to eliminate the need for 95% of the employees.   Therefore,  it's my assumption that this employee festival is only going to last a short amount of time.   My question is, what do you do with all the jobless people?  Hands that aren't busy tend to become dangerous.
nice, thanks
I want to be part of the 61 % of Americans that pay NO tax!
True, i want to quit may job as well.
It's in the book the wage will be amount of grains and wheat..we are in the last day.
It's in the book the wage will be amount of grains and wheat..we are in the last day.
Absolutely hate my job and the assholes I work with but I like the six figure salary.

Money is a satanic veil,blindfolding the ignorant to make them believe it is the source of happiness. It isn't. 
The most serious object that can destroy your life is money,money and money. Ask them,those that won the lottery jackpot !
I hope biden quits
You can't ignore the number of workers who were fired when they refused to take the experimental vaccine. Tyranny is no way to maintain a stabler workforce--or voter base.
This woman is a real professional. If she invites me to India, I am in the next plane just to see her.
It was forced out due to plandemic not resigned..get it straight..don't  twist it
The only people who can afford to quit is people with equity, and that's mostly white people and Asian people who are living marvelous. 💯
Awesome voice.  Powerful and exceptional voice
